question: Posted By Karen on September 16, 1998 at 20:37:23:After many tests, including 2 EMG tests, blood work, a test for diabetes, back exrays and physical examinations, my feet, burning and paining, have not been diagnosed and steadily detereorating.  Noone can say what it is except that it is neuralgia.  I am not convinced of this.  Could it be arthritis?  Not much shows up on the exrays.  Could the diabetes test not be thorough enough?  It mimics peripheral neuropathy.  What are my options?
title: Chronic Foot burning and pain
